label: Getijdenboek. Mnl. (na verminking aangevuld met ff. 14-26) - LTK 296

metadata.label: Content
metadata.value: Contains, in Dutch (and some Latin): (ff. 1v-13r) Calendar, use of Cambrai. - (ff. 14r-26v) Communion prayers, indulgence prayers and other prayers. - (ff. 27r-30v) Short Hours of the Cross. Incomplete (without beginning and end). - (ff. 31r-76v) Hours of the Virgin. Incomplete (without beginning, one leaf after f. 40, two leaves after f. 76). - (ff. 77r-93r) Penitential Psalms and Litany of the Saints. Incomplete (without beginning). - (ff. 93v-95r) Prayers in Latin: Credo, Magnificat, Nunc dimittis. - Empty: f. 95v.

metadata.label: Note
value: Folios 14-26 are added later to the manuscript (second half 15th century). The decoration on these folios points to Delft as production place.
Origin: Based on saint's- and feast days in the calendar for the diocese of Cambrai.
Script: Written by two scribes: ff. 1r-13v and 56r-127v (A), 14r-55v (B).
Illustration: Decorated pages before the major texts are missing.
Textual: (f. 20v) "Dit sijn die seven ween van onser liever vrouwen marien".
Also described by BNM, MMDC and A.W. Byvanckgenootschap (database RKD, The Hague).
